Comments
May 20, 2022
nlegore
After playing him l will say he is better than l originally thought. The full dial Running Shot and natural 3 damage is nice. He just needed a little something more, like top dial Outwit or some kind of Improved Targeting.
February 8, 2022
Battletank
Must be Tony after a few martini's
February 1, 2022
Slade Wilson
I agree with Adam. While not a great dial, it's not a terrible dial. With his range, full dial RS and 20+ defense from range, it has possibilities. Average dial at best. If only it was Invulnerability in place of Toughness.
January 5, 2022
SpiderMax
Perfect for Jocasta
December 23, 2021
AdamWarlock
I think people are being a bit harsh on this figure. Toughness isn't great but its there for the full dial and he's hard to hit from range. The full dial of running shot makes keeping people out of range none too difficult. He's nothing amazing but for 75 points I think the full dial of running shot and 3 damage is pretty decent. A little bit of enhancement will go a long way here.
December 18, 2021
nlegore
They should have have just gave him traited ES/D and then normal Invulnerability for the for half of the dial and normal Toughness for the second half.
December 10, 2021
SpyderNick88
Another dog sh!+ Wizkids design. Toughness, for a suit that he flys around outer space with? Get real. It's so obvious they only spend time designing the chases and some of the SR. Completely turned me off to buying sealed product.
December 9, 2021
The Singularity
In this set, wearing a full suit of armor grants toughness.
